user.description: Enter your Google Maps Platform API key.

reconfigure.description: Update your Google Maps API key.

abort.wrong_account: The unique account for this integration cannot be changed.

init.description: Configure default language and travel mode for Google Maps tools.

gmaps_places_search_text.name: Places text search
gmaps_places_search_text.description: Search for places using a free-form text query with optional filters (rating, price, open now).

gmaps_places_search_nearby.name: Places nearby search
gmaps_places_search_nearby.description: Find places near a location within a radius filtered by included/excluded types.

gmaps_place_details.name: Place details
gmaps_place_details.description: Get details for a place id including hours, rating, price level, phone, and website.
